short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Hacks Standings' button to Codeforces contest standings page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The normal standings page on CodeForces is quite good, but the one feature that should be added would be to display all the Top Hackers for each contest, alongside all the Top Performers. 

This extension solves this issue. This is the most efficient extension to see live hacks leaderboard during the hacking phase and after the hacking phase ends. This helps hackers analyse which problems have weak test cases during the hacking phase.

Demo video: https://studio.youtube.com/video/J4P4t6bTUHk/edit
